flavor: "I will not rest in the defense of my homeland."
name: Black Panther
text: [star] Response: After Black Panther uses a basic power, resolve the "Special" ability on 1 [[Black Panther]] upgrade you control.

name: Shuri
text: Inventor — Action: Exhaust Shuri → search your deck for a [[Black Panther]] or [[Tech]] upgrade and play it, reducing its resource cost by 2. (Limit once per round.)

name: T'Challa
text: [star] Hero Response: After T'Challa uses a basic power, resolve the "Special" ability on 1 [[Black Panther]] upgrade you control.

flavor: "You've face the muscle of Wakanda...now face its claws!" —Black Panther
name: Clawed Strike
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy. Resolve the "Special" ability on 1 [[Black Panther]] upgrade you control.

name: On the Prowl
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. Resolve the "Special" ability on 1 [[Black Panther]] upgrade you control.

flavor: "It is more than a battlecry. It is a promise." —Black Panther
name: Wakanda Forever!
text: Hero Action: Resolve the "Special" ability on each [[Black Panther]] upgrade you control in any order.

flavor: "Since the time of Bashenga, we've controlled our destiny as few other nations have." —T'Challa
name: Vibranium

flavor: This council seeks answers to Wakanda's problems.
name: The Elephant's Trunk
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust The Elephant's Trunk and up to 2 other [[Wakanda]] allies and/or supports you control → draw 1 card for each card exhausted this way (including this one).

flavor: "I have never known you to leave a problem unsolved, my daughter."
name: Queen Ramonda
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Queen Ramonda → heal damage from an alter-ego with the [[Wakanda]] trait equal to that alter-ego's REC.

flavor: Shuri is known as the keeper of Wakandan memory.
name: Aja-Adanna
text: Action: Exhaust Aja-Adanna → shuffle 1 identity-specific card from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Kimoyo Beads
text: Special (thwart): Remove 1 threat from a scheme. You may discard this card to confuse an enemy.

name: Panther Claws
text: Special (attack): Deal 2 damage to an enemy. You may discard this card to deal 3 additional damage to that enemy. If you do, this attack gains piercing.

name: Spider Bites
text: Special: Choose a player. Deal 1 damage to the villain and each minion engaged with that player. You may discard this card to stun each of those enemies.

flavor: "It's a 'mantle,' not a catsuit, than you very much." —Black Panther
name: Vibranium Suit
text: Special (attack): Move 1 damage from your hero to an enemy. You may discard this card to give your hero a tough status card.

flavor: "I ask the universe to fold itself so that I can travel to any place with a single step."
name: Manifold
text: Response: After Manifold enters play, choose a player. That player searches their deck and discard pile for a player side scheme and adds it to their hand.

name: Infiltration
text: Hero Action (thwart): Choose a number from 1 to 5. Discard that many cards from the top of the encounter deck → remote 1 threat from a scheme for each card discarded this way. Put 1 minion discarded this way into play engaged with you.

name: Going Undercover
text: Victory 0. When Defeated: The defeating player looks at the top 5 cards of the encounter deck. They may add 1 non-scenario-specific card from among those to the victory display, then place the rest on the top and/or bottom of the encounter deck in any order.

name: Show of Empathy
text: Victory 0. Forced Interrupt: When threat is removed from this scheme, place that threat on a non-[[Elite]] minion. If that minion has threat on it equal to or greater than its remaining hit points, add Show of Empathy to the victory display and attach 1 set-aside copy of Redemption to that minion.

name: The Raft
text: Response: After a minion leaves play, tuck it under here from the encounter discard pile → remove threat from a scheme equal to the tucked minion's printed SCH. If there are at least 4 minions here, deal 1 random minion here to any player as a facedown encounter card.

flavor: "Now you see me, now you don't." —Phil Coulson
name: Invisibility Gear
text: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Interrupt: When an enemy would attack you, discard Invisibility Gear → that enemy schemes instead.

flavor: "And I would have gotten way with it, too!" —Mister Rasputin
name: Sting Operation
text: Max 1 per player. Response: After a non-[[Elite]] minion schemes, discard Sting Operation → discard that minion.

name: Aneka
text: [star] Response: After Aneka uses a basic power, resolve the "Special" ability on another [[Dora Milaje]] ally. Special: Remove 1 threat from a scheme.

name: Ayo
text: [star] Response: After Ayo uses a basic power, resolve the "Special" ability on another [[Dora Milaje]] ally. Special: Deal 1 damage to an enemy.

name: Okoye
text: [star] Response: After Okoye uses a basic power, resolve the "Special" ability on another [[Dora Milaje]] ally. Special: Choose a [[Wakanda]] hero or ally. They get +1 THW and +1 ATK until the end of the phase.

name: Heart of the Panther
text: Team-Up (Black Panther/T'Challa and Black Panther/Shuri). Max 1 per deck. Hero Action: Search your deck and discard pile for a [[Black Panther]] upgrade and put it into play. Resolve the "Special" ability on up to 4 [[Black Panther]] upgrades you control in any order.

name: Dora Milaje
text: Ignore this card's resource cost if your identity has the [[Wakanda]] trait. Action: Exhaust Dora Milaje → resolve the "Special" ability on 1 [[Dora Milaje]] ally and heal 1 damage from that ally.

name: Redemption
text:
Linked (Show of Empathy). Victory 0.
Take control of attached minion and treat it as a [[Redeemed]] ally with a blank text box. Its THW is equal to its printed SCH and it takes 1 consequential damage after it thwarts or attacks.

flavor: As a member of Wakanda's secret police, the Hatut Zeraze, the White Wolf is willing to use extreme methods to defend his adopted home nation.
name: White Wolf
text: [star] Forced Response: After White Wolf attacks, place 1 threat on the main scheme.

name: Target Spotter
text: Uses (2 target counters). Interrupt: When a minion would engage a player, remove 1 target counter from here → that minion cannot activate until the end of the phase. Engage that minion.
